summary: This module implements a configurable textual progress indicator for Dask computations. It provides a progress bar that shows completion percentage, elapsed time, and can be customized in terms of display delay, width, update frequency, and output stream. The bar can be used as a context manager or registered globally to automatically track task progress.
business_intent: Enable users to monitor and visualize the execution progress of Dask workloads, facilitating better insight, debugging, and user experience during parallel or distributed processing.
